snippet: Rangers Coach John Tortorella said his comments about referees after the Winter Classic were meant to be "tongue-in-cheek."
abstract: Rangers Coach John Tortorella said his comments about referees after the Winter Classic were meant to be "tongue-in-cheek."
lead_paragraph: 8:30 p.m. | Update Tortorella was fined $30,000 by the N.H.L., according to a league official.

headline.main: Tortorella Fined for Winter Classic Comments
